评论概述: Knit fabric, warm, stretchy, forgiving, classy dress
评论详情: Size: medium Measurements for reference: 5'5" 155 pound athletic build, 38 in chest, 31 in waist, 41 in shoulder, 40 in hip, 36C/D bra  This dress was appropriate in length for a professional atmosphere or dinner out. The fabric is a thick stretchy knit that is soft to the touch. It is forgiving on the curves, especially if worn with shapewear. I would recommend this dress.  Full Disclosure: This review is based on my personal and unbiased opinion. The item reviewed was gifted to me in exchange for my personal and unbiased opinion through the Amazon Vine Customer program. I am as selective about getting an item to review as I would be about purchasing that same item. My reviews are NOT based on packaging or if it was delivered in a timely manner.  *My personal rating method* ⭐ - Terrible. I wouldn't recommend purchasing. ⭐⭐ - Marginal at best. Doesn't meet the minimum requirements to be useful. Buy at your own risk. ⭐⭐⭐ - Somewhat lacking. Meets requirements for a product of this type, but is not out of the ordinary and somewhat lacking. If the price is good, consider purchasing. ⭐⭐⭐⭐ - Average. Meets the requirements of a product of this type, but is not extraordinary. Consider purchasing. ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ - Exceptional. Excellent and has some nice features as well as being reasonably priced for a product of this type.

评论详情: Wanted to love this for a cute winter sweater dress, but it needs some color to contrast in the waist line for sure. I got pink, so maybe it would be better in a darker color, but if it had some white piping on the edges and waist, it would be a whole different review for me. It is not for summer at all due to it's very thick but nice feel fabric. I returned due to the color scheme not working for me, so not sure how it washes or wears over time.
